articles.description: It may be thousands of miles from the frontline, but the Ukrainian soccer team is never far from the horrors of war.
articles.content:
It may be thousands of miles from the frontline, but the Ukrainian soccer team is never far from the horrors of war.

articles.title: Lil Wayne Congratulates Miami’s Cavinder Twins, LSU’s Reese for Sweet 16 Wins - Sports Illustrated
articles.description: The Grammy Award-winning rapper was tuned into the women’s Sweet 16 games on Friday.
articles.content:
Rapper Lil Wayne was locked into the 2023 women’s NCAA tournament as he acknowledged both No. 9 seed Miami and No. 3 seed LSU in their Sweet 16 victories on Friday.
